title: Sure-Loc Hardware DU101 11P Durango Passage Knob, Vintage Bronze
features: Includes mounting hardware and instructions for easy installation
Adjustable latches fit standard door preparations at 2 3/8 as well as 2 3/4 Inch
description: As part of the Sure-Lock Contemporary Series, the Durango Knob adds reliable function and style that compliments modern home trends. The passage knob is designed for doors where no locking mechanism is required such as hall, closet, or child's bedroom. Knobs are ANSI Grade 3.
